flags.name: --color-hex
flags.validation: Must be a valid color hex and allowed by labor classification.

flags.name: --craft-class
flags.validation: If provided, craft class must belong to the same broker as the laborer.

permissions: User must be an admin, an organization manager for the laborer’s organization, or a broker member.
side_effects: Updates laborer attributes and/or craft class relationship.
validation_notes: Requires a laborer ID argument. At least one attribute or relationship must be provided to update. labor-classification, user, and organization cannot be changed after creation. color-hex must be a valid color hex and the labor classification must allow colors. A laborer cannot be activated if the user lacks membership with the organization. When a craft class is provided, it must share the same broker as the laborer.
